member.name: T:AsyncKeyState.AsyncInput
member.summary: Provides methods to get the asynchronous state of a virtual key.

member.name: F:AsyncKeyState.AsyncInput.MaxKeyValue
member.summary: The upper bound of a virtual key.

member.name: F:AsyncKeyState.AsyncInput.MinKeyValue
member.summary: The lower bound of a virtual key.

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.AsyncInput.GetKeyState(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Returns the asynchronous state of a virtual key.
member.returns: The state of a virtual key code.

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.AsyncInput.IsPressed(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Determines whether a key is pressed.
member.returns: if the virtual key is pressed; otherwise, .

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.AsyncInput.WasPressed(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Determines whether a key was pressed.
member.returns: if the virtual key was pressed; otherwise, .

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.AsyncInput.IsFirstTimePressed(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Determines whether a key is pressed for the first time and not held down.
member.returns: if the virtual key is pressed for the first time and not held down; otherwise, .

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.AsyncInput.IsToggled(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Determines whether a key is toggled.
member.returns: if the virtual key is toggled; otherwise, .

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.AsyncInput.IsUp(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Determines whether a key is not pressed or toggled.
member.returns: if the virtual key is not pressed or toggled; otherwise, .

member.name: T:AsyncKeyState.KeyboardState
member.summary: Provides access to the asynchronous status of all virtual keys.

member.name: F:AsyncKeyState.KeyboardState.MaxKeyValue
member.summary: The upper bound of a virtual key.

member.name: F:AsyncKeyState.KeyboardState.MinKeyValue
member.summary: The lower bound of a virtual key.

member.name: P:AsyncKeyState.KeyboardState.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the bit field representing the status of a key.
member.returns: A 1 byte large bit field holding the status of a virtual key.

member.name: P:AsyncKeyState.KeyboardState.Item(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Gets the key state of a specified key.
member.returns: The KeyStates of the specified key.

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.KeyboardState.Update
member.summary: Updates the buffer holding the status of all virtual keys.

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.KeyboardState.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether this instance and a specified represent the same type and were created on the same thread.
member.param: The object to compare with this instance.
member.returns: if is a KeyboardState and was created on the same thread; otherwise, .

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.KeyboardState.Equals(AsyncKeyState.KeyboardState)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether two specified instances of KeyboardState were created on the same thread.
member.param: An object to compare to this instance.
member.returns: if was created on the same thread; otherwise, .

member.summary: Returns the hash code for this instance.

member.summary: Instantiates a new KeyboardState object.

member.summary: Gets a cached and thread-static KeyboardState object which is unique for the calling thread and updates it.
member.returns: A KeyboardState object.

member.summary: Gets a cached and thread-static KeyboardState object which is unique for the calling thread.
member.param: Indicates whether the thread-static KeyboardState object should be updated before returning it.
member.returns: A KeyboardState object.

member.name: T:AsyncKeyState.KeyCodeConverter
member.summary: Provides methods to convert between strings and enums and aswell Windows Forms (Keys) and WPF (Key) enums.

member.name: P:AsyncKeyState.KeyCodeConverter.Keys
member.summary: Gets a readonly enumeration of all Keys.

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.KeyCodeConverter.ToInt(System.Windows.Input.Key)
member.summary: Converts a WPF Key to a signed integer.
member.returns: The signed int value representing a WPF Key.

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.KeyCodeConverter.ToInt(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Converts a Windows Forms Keys to a signed integer.
member.returns: The signed int value representing a WPF Keys.

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.KeyCodeConverter.ToString(System.Windows.Input.Key)
member.summary: Converts a WPF Key to a human readable string.
member.returns: The string this method generates.

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.KeyCodeConverter.ToString(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Converts a Windows Forms Keys to a human readable string.
member.param: A Windows Forms Keys enum value.
member.returns: The string this method generates.

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.KeyCodeConverter.WPFKeyFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Turns the string representation of a WPF Key to a WPF Key enum value.
member.param: The string representation of a WPF Key enum value.
member.returns: The WPF Key enum value.

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.KeyCodeConverter.FormsKeyFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Turns the string representation of a Windows Forms Keys to a Windows Forms Keys enum value.
member.param: The string representation of a Windows Forms Keys enum value.
member.returns: The Windows Forms Keys enum value.

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.KeyCodeConverter.FormsKeyToWPFKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Converts a Windows Forms Keys enum value to a WPF Key enum value.
member.param: A Windows Forms Keys enum value.
member.returns: The WPF Key enum value.

member.name: M:AsyncKeyState.KeyCodeConverter.WPFKeyToFormsKey(System.Windows.Input.Key)
member.summary: Converts a WPF Key enum value to a Windows Forms Keys enum value.
member.returns: The Windows Forms Keys enum value.

member.summary: Gets a readonly enumeration of all KeyStates.

member.summary: Converts a KeyStates enum value to a human readable string.
